function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:02:06 UTC – Details)

From the brand

LISEN electronic accessory stand helps us break the bad habit of looking down at the phone for a long time

Most comfortable height for the neck, shoulders and neck designed by German scientists according to ergonomics
Preserving a head-up or slightly upward gaze while using electronic devices can successfully avoid development of “text neck”
This new phone stand that is higher than the triangular phone base will be your most valuable product

LISEN New Stand Recommend

TALLER AND MORE PHOTOGENIC STAND, HELP TO CORRECT THE “TEXT NECK”: This cell phone stand holder is in accordance with ergonomic design. Providing you comfortable viewing angle which helps to fix your posture and reduce neck & back strain. The height can be easily adjusted between 7.1in-8.5in(1.4in adjustable range), the angle is adjustable between 5°~85°
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: [No bent & tangling & tip over worries] when using while charging. Due to bent cable, the low phone dock maybe fall over. LISEN stylish adjustable phone holder for desk has a reserved charging hole design, supports cable management, [No bent & tangling & tip over worries]. This phone pad will not cover the subtitle when you watch the video
WEIGHTED ANTI-SLIP BASE: This cell phone stand for desk is equipped with a weighted base and an aluminum alloy rod. Therefore, this iPhone stand holder is stable enough to support all smartphones or small tablets, such as 2021 iPad Mini, iPhone 14 pro max 13 Pro/13 Mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/iPhone 11/11 Pro/Max/X/MAX/XR/8/8P, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, Note 10/9/8/Plus, S10/S9/S8, Kindel, Switch, iPad Mini,iPad Air, etc.We recommend the most stable compatible device size is 4-10 inchs
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The pad back and the bottom of this cell phone stand are fully covered by anti-skid silicone, which LISEN iPad stand holder can provide maximum protection for your device from any scratches and slides, grips friendly
WE CARE ABOUT YOU: If the product arrives broken, or get broken within 365 days, please directly contact LISEN for satisfied solution. Any other problem like could not tighten the screw, please also contact us. We sincerely care about every customer’s shopping experience! (Product including: phone stand*1, screw*1, hexagon screwdriver*1, specification*1)






LISEN electronic Accessories stand help to save the bad habit that we are spending more and more time bow head to looking on our mobile phones

  • Choosing LISEN electronic accessories stand, the most suitable height designed by German scientists based on ergonomic shoulder and neck
  • As long as you insist on using it for 1 hour a day, Keep hold head looking up at electronic devices
  • Can effectively alleviate the formation of our “text neck”, help our family enjoy the joy of playing with electronic devices while staying healthy
  • This new style mobile electronic stand will be your most valuable product, higher than triangular cell phone dock, Save you from the bad habit of head down playing phone!

Questions & Answers

Q1: Is this cell phone stands stable for a big phone and tablets?

Answer: Yes. this phone holder can support all cell phones. In addition, LISEN iPhone stand for desk can also stably adapt to small tablets less than 10 inchs, like 2021 iPad mini etc.

Q2: How tall is this cell phone stand holder?

Answer: The height of this desk phone stand is 1.4 inches adjustable, is flush with the face or slightly higher, so that you can be more calm and elegant during video calls.




Thoughtful Storage Base

Aesthetics of desk fashion With a storage base design, this iPhone stand holder can help to organize small things, such as airphones, rings, clips to avoid losing them.

Cable Organizer & Charging Hole

Featured with reserved charging hole and cable organizer circle, this cell phone holder stand is convenient for charging, and make your desk neat and tidy. No worry with cable tangling.

Full Covered Silicone Pad

Fully covered by soft silicone pad (back and feet), it can protect devices from scratch while 4 to 10 inch devices sitting comfortably. And it can support up to 0.53 inch thick phones with case.

Item Weight 1.28 pounds

ASIN B0822FS7Z6
Country of Origin China
Item model number SP-122IN1-GRAY
Customer Reviews

4.7 out of 5 stars

3,668 ratings

4.7 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #3 in Computer & Mobile Device Repair Kits
Date First Available November 26, 2019

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $26.99 - $22.29
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:40 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Since its inception in 2013, SHOWPIN has been synonymous with quality, innovation, efficiency and value.

As a manufacturer of professional repair tools, we integrate R&D, manufacturing and sales, are committed to designing and manufacturing product that meet our customers’ needs and provide them with reliable products. Our product sold all over North America, Japan, Europe.

Our thinking: bring small but beautiful changes to life through repair.

Precision Screwdriver Set

Household & Electronics Repair

Mini screwdriver set

Make it easy to repair

【Powerful Functions】122 in 1 precision screwdriver set contains 98 screwdriver bits, 3TorxTR screwdriver bits and 21 auxiliary tools, such as screwdriver handle, flexible shaft, extension rod, magnetizer, magnetic pad, cleaning brush etc. Own this toolkit, you can replace the battery, screen and other parts of the smartphone, tablet, laptop, and upgrade the hard disk and performance of the computer and PC, disassemble and repair PS4, Xbox and other game consoles, repair drones, cameras, etc.
【Practical Repair Tool】This electronic screwdriver set is professionally designed to maximize your repair ability. The screwdriver handle is ergonomically designed, with non-slip particles outside, easy to exert force and rotate smoothly; the 4.56 inch alloy steel extension rod has high hardness, not easy to bend, suitable for narrow gaps; 5.11 inch flexible shaft is composed of CRV springs , which can be bent 180° and rotated 360°, helping you easily deal with complex disassembly environments.
【Quality First】The screwdriver bits in this laptop repair tool kit are made of Cr-V Steel, after high temperature treatment process, the hardness can reach 60HRC, stronger and not easy to damage, suitable for long-term use for repairing Electronics. This computer repair kit is equipped with spare bits for frequently used models( such as phillips, slot, tri-point) to avoid the need to find a new bit or replace a new screwdriver set if the bit is lost or damaged.
【With Professional Storage Case and Magnetizer】This computer tool kit comes with a shockproof plastic storage box, each screwdriver bit is well placed in the corresponding slot, easy to find and store. The included magnetizer can easily enhance the magnetic properties of the screwdriver bit. The 5.7*3.3 inch magnetic pad can absorb small screws and tiny metal parts, no worry about losing screws, or damage electronic components due to strong magnetism.
【Excellent Service】This screwdriver repair kit provides a 90-day refund and lifetime warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution within 24 hours. This screwdriver set is designed for disassembled and installation, even an amateur can easily repair electronic devices, making it a great Christmas gift for your husband, father, son or friend, bring them the surprise and fun of maintenance.


Premium Bits

These bits are precisely CNC machined, manufactured from high quality chrome vanadium steel that reduce rust, corrosion and abrasions giving you exact fit and long lasting service.

Precision Screwdriver Set

101 Screwdriver Bits and 21 Repair Tools

21 Repair Tools：Plastic Opening Tools, ESD Tweezers, SIM Card Ejector Pin, LCD Suction Cup, Triangle Opening Pry Tool, Plastic Spudgers, Magnetizing and Demagnetizing Tool and etc.

  • Computers and iMac
  • Laptops and Macbook
  • Tablet and iPads
  • iPhone and Android Phones
  • Game Consoles
  • Home Appliances
  • And More…

Read more

Bit Included Specification

Triangle 2.0, 2.3, 2.7, 3.0
Pozidriv PZ000, PZ00, PZ0, PZ1, PZ2
Phillips PH0000, PH000, PH00, PH0, PH1, PH2
TorxTR T6H,T7H,T8H,T9H,T10H,T15H,T20H,T25H
Mini Hex MH2.5,MH3.0,MH3.5,MH4.0,MH4.5,MH5.0,MH5.5
Hexagon H0.7,H0.9,H1.0,H1.3,H1.5,H2.0,H2.5,H3.0,H3.5,H4.0,H4.5
Square S0, S1, S2
U-Type U2.3, U2.6, U8
Pentalobe 0.8, 1.2, 1.5, 2.0
Torx T1 ,T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7, T8, T9, T10, T15, T20
Schlitz SL1.0,SL1.3,SL1.5,SL2.0,SL2.5,SL3.0,SL3.5,SL4.0
Special Type S2 TorxTR: T6H,T8H,T10H, MID: 2.5, PH2, SIM: 0.8, Mini Torx:MT3.8,MT4.5

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) — OVERVIEW — – High quality cowhide, 100% handmade (cutting, dyeing, stitching…) – 10 COLORS, CUSTOM NAME/TEXT/IMAGE… ENGRAVING — CUSTOMIZATION — – With an extra charge of US $5/each name/initials/image… in each side, personalized request will be made as your idea. – We accept request for re-structure products, make as ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:12:13 UTC – Details)



— OVERVIEW —
– High quality cowhide, 100% handmade (cutting, dyeing, stitching…)
– 10 COLORS, CUSTOM NAME/TEXT/IMAGE… ENGRAVING

— CUSTOMIZATION —
– With an extra charge of US $5/each name/initials/image… in each side, personalized request will be made as your idea.
– We accept request for re-structure products, make as sample or any specials request. Please reach us for more details.

— SHIPPING —
– Order will be completed within 03 to 05 working days after payment has been made. Normal shipping time is approximately 02 to 04 weeks (excluded public holidays) depending on your location.

— GENERAL NOTES —
– Each of our product is uniquely designed and handcrafted. At Unik4art, uniqueness is highly valued.
– Cowhide are widely used in our products. Kindly be aware that marks and random scars are naturally parts of original leather.
– Color of product may vary slightly compared to actual products upon receipt as cowhide is totally dyed by hand. We have 10 colors for you as final photo.
– The engraving text/image is always black, so that the darker the color, the less outstanding it is.
– If you don’t note us about the details position, the name/text will be engraved with the font Arial, on the right corner.

Should you have further questions, additional requests for your orders, please do not hesitate to reach us by leaving a comment at “Note to Seller”. We will quickly response you within 12 hours.

Enjoy Shopping!

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 6, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B085LJZV96

8″ HD display, 2X the storage (32 or 64 GB of internal storage and up to 1 TB with microSD card) + 3 GB RAM.
All-day battery life & wireless charging in less than 3 hours with charging dock – Up to 12 hours of reading, browsing the web, watching videos, and listening to music.
Wireless charging dock eliminates the need to plug in your Fire HD 8 Plus every time you want to charge it. The dock is always ready. Just drop your tablet in the dock and let it charge.
30% faster thanks to the new 2.0 GHz quad-core processor.
Enjoy your favorite apps like Netflix, Facebook, Hulu, Instagram, TikTok, and more through Amazon’s Appstore (Google Play not supported), plus 6 months free of Kindle Unlimited (you’ll receive the offer via email upon device activation).
Transform your tablet into an immersive, full-screen Alexa experience, optimized for visibility across the room. Just ask Alexa to show news, check the weather, view camera feeds, make a video call, set alarms, or play your favorite video and music, and much more.
Dock your Fire HD 8 Plus tablet in either portrait or landscape mode, and the cradle helps guide your tablet to ensure proper alignment

Product Description

LORYERGO LEMS06-1 Metal Monitor Stand Riser

Lift Your Screen to an Ergonomic Height

The 3.9-inch height of the laptop stand for desk can bring your display closer to eye level for more comfort and to help encourage a better posture.

Strength and Stability for Your Equipment

The laptop stand for desk is made of heavy-duty metal to support computers, laptops, printers, or monitors up to 44 pounds.

Multi-functional Design for a Better Workspace

The computer monitor stand lifts your equipment above the desktop to provide extra space for storage of office supplies, notebooks, keyboards, or other office accessories

ALL-IN-ONE STAND

The device slot of this laptop stand for desk can be used to display a phone or tablet to keep your personal device close by. No need to invest in a separate phone or tablet stand.

Non-Slip Pads

Each leg is equipped with pads for stability and to protect surfaces from scratches and make it safe when you stack two units together to get your desktop shelf

Ventilated Metal & Safe Round Corner

The metal platform of this monitor stand riser has ventilated holes to allow airflow for your devices. With its round corner, this monitor stand is friendly to children and pets

Curved Legs

The sturdy legs are curved to provide easier access to storage and can support up to 44lbs. Morden designed laptop riser to make your work station nice and lovely!

Model Number
LENS06-1 LEMS03 LEMS03K2 LEMS09 LEMS05 LEMS19

Color
Black Black Black Black Black Black

Material
Metal Metal Metal Wood Plastic Wood Platform and Metal Legs

Weight Capacity
44lb 44lb 44lb 44lb 44lb 44lb

Adjustable
No(Stand Height: 3.66”) Height Adjustable (4.0” / 4.8” / 5.6”) Height Adjustable (4.0” / 4.8” / 5.6”) No (Stand Height: 5.5”) Height Adjustable (5.9”/ 9.5”/ 13.2”) No (Stand Height: 4.72”)

Vents Design for Heat Dissipation – The metal platform of this laptop stand for desk features ventilation holes to aid airflow and heat dissipation. Allowing airflow to your laptop or preventing overheating.
All-in-One Stand – The device slot of this laptop riser for desk can be used to display a phone or tablet to keep your personal device close by. No need to invest in a separate phone or tablet stand thanks to the bonus feature.
Improve Storage Space – Store a keyboard or mouse under the laptop stand for a more organized workspace. You can stack two monitor riser together for a tiered shelf system. The legs have non-slip pads to protect surfaces from scratches.
Ergonomic Design – Raise your monitor stand to a more comfortable eye level with this laptop stand for desk. With 14.56”length, 9.25”depth, and 3.66” height, the stand dimensions work well for a wide variety of laptops and monitors.
Wide Device Compatibility – The monitor stand riser is compatible with multiple devices including laptops, monitors, small printers, game consoles, pc and more. The sturdy metal structure is designed to safely hold up to 44lbs.
